item.description:
Hello everyone,

We want this to be a traditional Thanksgiving of mashed potatoes, traditional veggies, and tofurkey. That means more than one person can bring each item. Depending on how many sign-up there could be 3 or 4 tofurkeys, for example.

So let me know as soon as you can if you want to attend and what you will bring. Alcohol is ok so byob.

Also, this year, we are asking if everyone can bring their own place settings.

This event is in a large kitchen-like room so there is a sink, stove, and refrigerator.

You can always write me at info@nhanimalrights.org if you have any questions.

Thanks,
Linda, new/old organizer
item.name: Gentle Thanksgiving Vegan Potluck
